doc:
Colin Clive https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colin_Clive 0 Colin Clive (born Colin Glenn Clive-Greig; 20 January 1900 – 25 June 1937) was a British-American stage and screen actor. His most memorable role was Henry Frankenstein in the 1931 monster film Frankenstein and its 1935 sequel, Bride of Frankenstein. Colin_Clive ( born Colin_Glenn_Clive-Greig ; 20_January_1900 – 25_June_1937 ) was a_British-American_stage_and_screen_actor . His_most_memorable_role was Henry_Frankenstein in the_1931_monster_film_Frankenstein and its_1935_sequel , Bride of Frankenstein .
